name: Institute for Communication and Development Action (ICDA)
briefDescription: The focus areas of the organization are women & child Development, Rural development & health. We have been running child labour school & 380 no. of child labour were mainstreamed by us as of now. We do advocacy Prog. Against child abuse. My Organization is the Dist. Coordinating agency of WRA-Orissa for safe motherhood and CASA for right to food. We are providing computer training to women/ girls and after completion of their training placement is arranged. We have been providing man, material and training support to small, marginal and landless farmers. Around 10,000 people are covered. Kindly visit our website for more details www.icda.org.in.
